title: Roberta Flack - Roberta (1994) RESEED
description:
MP3/192Kbps

Flack proves her mastery of gospel and jazz idioms. She manages to create a superb music, while presenting new treatments of material that, in less expert hands, could be flat and meaningless. Her work here is original and fresh.

Personnel: Roberta Flack (vocals); Paul Pesco (acoustic & electric guitar); Jerry Barnes (guitar, acoustic & electric bass, programming); Philip Hamilton (guitar); Aaron Flagg (trumpet); Katreese Barnes (saxophone, piano, background vocals); Rich Keller (keyboards, programming); Barry Miles (keyboards); Anthony Jackson, Roy Drummond (bass); Ivan Hampden, William "JuJu" House, Ben Riley (drums); Buddy Williams (hi-hat); Steve Kroon, Steve Thornton, Bashiri Johnson (percussion).
